BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections
Comment: Continuation of the July 15, 2015 - Recessed Meeting

Items.Title: Continuation of the July 15, 2015 - Recessed Meeting

Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Mary A. Valverde to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her appointment as the sculptor member of the New York City Art Commission, known as the Public Design Commission, pursuant to Sections 31 and 851 of the New York City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mary A. Valverde, New York City Art Commission

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Ellen Hoffman to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her appointment as President of the New York City Tax Commission, pursuant to Sections 31 and 153 of the New York City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Ellen Hoffman, President of the New York City Tax Commission

Items.Title: Priscilla Consolo a resident of Brooklyn, a candidate for recommendation by the Council to the Youth Board, pursuant to ยง 734 of the New York City Charter.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY
Resolution approving changes in Membership to certain Standing Committees and an allowance for an Officer of the Council.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Approving changes in Membership to certain Standing Committees and an allowance for an Officer of the Council.
